name: com.coffee.upm-git-extension
description:
This package extends the UI of Unity Package Manager (UPM) for the packages installed from git repository.

 - Support GitHub,  GitLab, Bitbucket, etc.
 - Link to the repogitory and offline documents
 - Install the package from git repository with UI
 - Update the package with a specific tag/branch
 - Remove the package
author: Jesper Mikkelsen <Pjusk3@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jsm-Bolt)
